maps/dreams/dream11.json/entities/126/se.orig: It was just bound to happen.
maps/dreams/dream11.json/entities/126/se.text: Il fallait forcément que ça arrive.

maps/dreams/dream11.json/entities/126/se.orig: There is no point... waiting for me...
maps/dreams/dream11.json/entities/126/se.text: Il n'y a aucune raison... de m'attendre...

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig: Lea, what is wrong with you!?

Why have you been 
away for so long?
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Pourquoi est-ce que tu étais
partie pendant si longtemps ?

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
Just why can't you 
explain yourself properly?!
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Pourquoi est-ce que tu peux
pas juste t'exprimer clairement ?!

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
Lea... Don't feel 
bad about it.
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Lea... Ne te sens
pas mal à cause de ça.

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
The fact that you can't talk
is part of who you are.
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Le fait que tu ne puisses pas
parler fait partie de qui tu es.

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
And it doesn't make 
you a bad person.
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Et cela ne fait pas de
toi quelqu'un de mauvais.

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
To the contrary, 
it makes you special.
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Au contraire,
cela te rend spéciale.

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
Because few can 
listen like you do.
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Peu d'entre nous peuvent
écouter comme tu le fais.

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/1/sett.orig: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/1/sett.text: La porte est verrouillée, c'est ça ? On dirait que l'on est piégé ici.

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: It's nice to finally meet you...\. in person.
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: C'est bien de finalement pouvoir te rencontrer...\. en personne.

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: Gautham, please be careful when interacting with manifestations of instant matter.
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Gautham, soit prudent en interagissant avec des manifestations d'instant-matières.

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: The risks are supposed to be low, but accidents can happen.
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Les risques sont censés être faibles, mais les accidents peuvent arriver.

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: You don't have to tell me.
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Tu n'as pas besoin de me le dire.

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: Well, it is certainly exciting to walk in the world you helped create!
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Bah, c'est que c'est réjouissant de pouvoir mettre un pied dans le monde que tu as aidé à créer !
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.note: assuming he talks to genius, not lea

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: The sense transmission of the Cross Gear is very accurate, but it still can't match the real thing.
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: La transmission des sens du Cross Gear est très précise, mais ça ne remplace toujours pas la vraie chose.

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: Still... I am worried about you. Are you sure you'll be fine?
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Mais... Je me fais du souci pour toi. Tu es sûr que tout va bien se passer pour toi ?

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: I'll just have to cope with it.
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Il va falloir que je m'y habitue.

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: It was all part of the agreement, no?
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: C'était une partie de l'accord, non ?

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: I...\. I never expected things...\. to go this way...
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Je...\. Je ne m'attendais pas à...\. que ça se passe comme ça...

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: To be asked to do... such things....
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: ... qu'on me demande de faire... de telles choses...

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: This is not...\. game design, anymore.
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Ce n'est plus...\. du game design.

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: This is not for the right experience...\. this is...\. wrong...
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Ce n'est plus pour le bon frisson...\. c'est...\. mal...
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.note: using frisson de jeu instead of expérience de jeu, whatever

maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.orig: I mustn't...\. tell you any more...
maps/dreams/dream13.json/entities/33/set.text: Je ne dois...\. plus rien te dire d'autre...

maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/0/sett.orig: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/0/sett.text: La porte est verrouillée, c'est ça ? On dirait que l'on est piégé ici.

maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.orig: She really doesn't respond at all...
maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.text: Elle ne répond vraiment plus du tout...

maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.orig:
It started about 
half an hour ago.
maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.text:
Ça a commencé il y a
environ une demi-heure.

maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.orig:
Do you think it's because 
of the incident with Shizuka?
maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.text:
Tu penses que c'est à
cause de l'incident avec Shizuka ?

maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.orig: But I'm afraid it's the first time I've encountered this kind of reaction.
maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.text: Mais je crains que ce ne soit pas la première fois que je rencontre ce genre de réactions.

maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.orig: I'd need direct access to the Evotar Server to effectively debug this.
maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.text: J'aurais besoin d'un accès direct au Serveur d'Évotars pour débogger ça efficacement.

maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.orig: That is out of the question.

maps/dreams/dream14.json/entities/29/set.text: Il n'y a vraiment aucune alternative ?
Il y a peut-être une autre possibilité.

maps/dreams/dream15.json/entities/349/se.orig: I wonder how the others are doing.\. Hlin, Buggy, Emilie...\. all of them.
maps/dreams/dream15.json/entities/349/se.text: Je me demande ce que les autres font.\. Hlin, Buggy, Emilie...\. Toute la troupe.

maps/dreams/dream15.json/entities/349/se.orig: They're probably worried about us, right?
maps/dreams/dream15.json/entities/349/se.text: Ils doivent se faire du souci pour nous, non ?

maps/dreams/dream15.json/entities/349/se.orig: In difficult times like these, it's good to know there are people out there that care for you.
maps/dreams/dream15.json/entities/349/se.text: Dans des temps difficiles comme ceux-là...\. Ça fait du bien de savoir qu'il y a des gens en dehors qui se font du souci pour nous.
